boardgame.name: Summoner Wars
Summoner Wars: Války vyvolavačů
boardgame.description: NOTE:This entry is currently in flux! All of the forum posts, and linked items are being moved to the individual game entries, with anything sufficiently generic being linked to the Summoner Wars Master Set. All content will be maintained._T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;Summoner Wars is a fast-playing, action-packed 2-4 player card game. Players take on the role of Summoners: powerful beings who harness the power of mysterious Summoning Stones to lead their race to conquest on the war-torn planet of Itharia. These Summoners wield terrible magic on the battlefield, freezing their foes in place, draining their enemies of power, and even bringing rains of fire down from the heavens. But most notoriously, they summon their great race_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_amp;rsquo;s hordes of warriors to the battlefield, to clash in the never-ending struggle for supremacy. A Summoner is both mage and general, and must combine their wizardly might with clever tactics to defeat the enemy Summoner on the opposite side of the battle._T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;Each Starter Set of Summoner Wars contains 2 complete, battle-ready Factions, ready to jump you and an opponent into the thick of the War for Itharia. Each Faction is a unique race or civilization with its own secret goals, be it wild-eyed Elves bent on revenge, or blood-crazed Goblins who merely want to set the world ablaze. Starter Sets also include everything you will need to play, including a Battle Mat, Wound counters, dice, and a rulebook._T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;But the war doesn_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_amp;rsquo;t end there! Summoner Wars is fully expandable with entirely new faction decks such as the hideous Undead of the Fallen Kingdom, or the righteous and knightly Human Vanguards. In addition, each Faction will have its own expansions, adding new warriors, summoners, and abilities to allow for a never-ending mix of combat options and surprises. Expansions will also include Mercenary units - warriors who care nothing for politics and will fight for any side that can afford them!_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;Summoner Wars uses a simple but deep rules set to capture both the strategy of deck construction and card playing, with the tactics of miniature war games. By purchasing expansions or multiple Starter Sets, players can customize their Faction Decks to suit any style of play and to keep their opponents guessing. During the game, players summon and move their various warriors about the battlefield using their unique powers and abilities to wreak havoc on the enemy lines. In the course of a game each side will inflict terrible casualties upon the other in their brutal quest for victory._T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;Note: This entry in the BGG database is used to consolidate questions and discussion regarding the Summoner Wars series; it does not correspond to a particular box or deck of the Summoner Wars game. For the base Starter Set releases, refer to BGG entries for Summoner Wars: Phoenix Elves vs Tundra Orcs and Summoner Wars: Guild Dwarves vs Cave Goblins._T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;

KK Boardgames ~ supplier-direct games ~ your Canadian and US source for discount game prices based in Vancouver, BC and Blaine, WA. All prices in USD and all games are new and in shrink unless otherwise stated. For Canadian customers who want to pay in CAD, we can convert to CAD based on the current exchange rate. Summoner Wars - $19.96 Availability: DIRECT ORDER - In stock at our supplier. *** Usually ships in 1-2 weeks ***. If you place an order, we will include the game in our next order from our supplier* *Next order date - to see our next order date click on the _T_E_M_P_T_A_G_quot;More info..._T_E_M_P_T_A_G_quot; link. If the _T_E_M_P_T_A_G_quot;More info..._T_E_M_P_T_A_G_quot; link is not visible, click on the user ID _T_E_M_P_T_A_G_#039;kkrieger_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_#039; to view our _T_E_M_P_T_A_G_#039;geekstore_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_#039;, then click on the _T_E_M_P_T_A_G_quot;More info..._T_E_M_P_T_A_G_quot; link for a specific game. SHIPPING: We are near the US/Canada border so we can ship from either country -- there are absolutely no customs fees for US and Canada orders! For Canadian orders, we ship with Canada Post and charge a flat rate for one game (based on your province, see below) + $1.50 for each additional game (up to a maximum of an additional $6). e.g. The 2nd, 3rd, 4th, 5th games ship for $1.50 each, all subsequent games ship for free. Metro Vancouver area $8.50 (1 business day) or $0.00* Victoria (South Vancouver Island) $10 (2 business days) BC $12 (2 business days) AB $13 (2 business days) SK $13 (3 business days) MB $14 (3 business days) ON $15 (4 business days) QC $15 (5 business days) PE,NB,NS $15 (7 business days) NL $17 (8 business days) YT $17 (5 business days) NU/NT/Remote areas $17 (up to 13 business days) *FREE local pick-up in Vancouver area. US Orders are shipped USPS from zipcode 98230. International Orders are shipped USPS Priority Mail International with insurance and return receipt. PROMOTIONS: Loyalty rewards: For every $50 of games on your order, receive a $2.50 credit to be used on a future order. PAYMENT METHODS: We accept the following forms of payment: 1. Interac e-Transfer* (Canadian banks) 2. Cash on delivery (local pick-up greater Vancouver area) 3. PayPal (Instant Transfer or debit/credit card funded) 4. Credit cards (processed by PayPal - your information is never shared with us) 5. Money Order - we will accept postal money orders, but will not ship games until money order is received and cashed. Our prices include a discount for paying cash or another no fee method (1-2 above). All payments processed by PayPal (3-4 above) will incur an extra charge of $0.30 + 2.9% to pass on the exact processing costs charged to us by PayPal. International payments through PayPal are $0.30 + 3.9%. We will provide detailed payment instructions for you once the order is placed. CONTACT US: Although we will make an effort to respond to all questions via geekmail as quickly as possible, your response time will be faster if you send questions via email to kkboardgames+bgg@gmail.com

Base Sets: - Original Master Set - Alliances Master Set (Signed by Colby!!!) - Phoenix Elves v. Tundra Orcs Starter Set - Guild Dwarves v. Cave Goblins Starter Set Original Faction Packs: - Vanguards - Fallen Kingdom - Jungle Elves - Cloaks - Mercenaries - The Filth Reinforcement Packs: - Rukar’s Power - Grungor’s Charge - Goodwin’s Blade - Hawk’s Strike - Saella’s Precision - Bellor’s Retribution - Taliya’s Spirit - Piclo’s Magic Second Summoner Faction Packs: - Phoenix Elves - Tundra Orcs - Guild Dwarves - Cave Goblins - Vanguards - Fallen Kingdom - Jungle Elves - Cloaks Additional/Misc Items: - 2000 Premium Swan Panasia Sleeves: The sleeves are the high quality premium thick Swan Panasia sleeves. At 60mm x 90mm, they are arguably the only sleeves on the market to perfectly fit this game and will protect this collection for years to come! Note- There are roughly 1500 cards (brand new and sealed) in the listing above. Everything comes from a smoke-free home and I will ship anywhere in the world!

The item I am selling is a complete set of 40 Summoner Wars faction decks, all in excellent condition (a few of the cards have slight wear on the edges, but the majority have hardly been touched); the counters, dice, etc. included with the revised PE vs. TO and GD vs. CG starters; the storage box, rubber playmat (a little squashed, but still perfectly usable), rulebook and accessories that come with the Alliances Master Set; the playmat included with the original print run (non-revised) Master Set; and all four promo Mercenary Champions (Khan Queso, Khexhu, Bodgan and Sairook), each one in excellent condition. The eight reinforcement packs are not included. The cards all have the revised treatment, with a smooth coating that allows for easy shuffling and less chance of cardboard cuts, though I haven_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_#039;t had the chance to play the game more than a couple of times outside of the app (being socially awkward when meeting people kind of has its drawbacks). I intend to sell the collection with everything sorted inside the Alliances box (except for the playmats, which need to be separate).
